file_content.text: We'll call off the curfew now that Anchorhead's safe from slavers.
The slaves are free.
I know! We've had a few straggle in here talking about the hotshot strangers who tore up the Twin Suns.
I know! We've had a few turn up here with a wild story about a lone woman who took on all the Twin Suns.
I know! We've had some make their way back here, and they're telling everyone how one man took out all the Twin Suns.
I'll send some of the militia boys to hold that hangar the Suns were working out of.
We'll make sure no one starts that sort of thing up again. On behalf of the free men of Tatooine, I thank you.
Check the warehouse thoroughly. I'm sure you'll find some kind of clue to their slaving operation.
Morning, everybody.
Morning, Master Jedi.
Morning, stranger. Don't take much to see you're not a local to Anchorhead.
Now, I'm not going to beat around the bush. We need help, and I'm hoping you can provide it.
The Twin Suns pirates think they can get away with murder, and usually do. But now they're selling our people as slaves and we won't stand for it.
No one deserves that fate.
I will stop them.
That was pretty much our consensus, Master Jedi.
It is my duty to end any trafficking in human misery.
How can I help?
Thank you, Master Jedi.
The Republic doesn't tolerate slavery.
I'll put a stop to that.
Then maybe we ought to be part of the Republic.
The Twin Suns, huh? As it happens, I've got some experience going up against crime syndicates.
Maybe I can help.
I'm sure.
Keep talking.
Defend yourselves.
Have you seen the militia around here? Part-time farmers and half-trained boys. But we're doing our best.
We don't know where they're holding the slaves, but we have uncovered a different Twin Suns operation.
Old Czerka droids--they're smuggling them off-planet by way of a warehouse outside Anchorhead. I figure that's the place to start looking for anything more.
I'll go right now.
Anything else I should know?
They guard the warehouse pretty heavily. Some of the thugs there are sure to know what the other side of their operation is doing.
Search any communications you find. See if you can follow the trail to uncover their slaving operation.
The children of Anchorhead are counting on you.
Sorry. [Refuse quest]
You've got a heart of stone.
Curfew's in effect, starting at 2100 hours.
